author: Harry Craddock
description: Kümmel's answer to the Stinger. To quote Harry Craddock, "Brandy gives you courage and Kümmel makes you cautious, thus giving you the perfect mixture of bravery and caution, with the bravery predominating."
name: Quelle Vie
recipeIngredient: 22.5 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
